languages.text: "И не забудь добавить, что я не в обиде. Но при случае спрошу должок".

traits.locale_text: "И не забудь добавить, что я не в обиде. Но при случае спрошу должок".

languages.text: "And don't forget to tell him that I'm not mad. But I will be collecting the debt, sometime."
languages.original_text: "И не забудь добавить, что я не в обиде. Но при случае спрошу должок".

traits.locale_text: "And don't forget to tell him that I'm not mad. But I will collect the debt, sometime."
"And don't forget to tell him that I'm not mad. But I will collect the debt, sometime."
"And don't forget to tell him that I'm not mad. But I will be collecting the debt, sometime."
"And don't forget to tell him that I'm not mad. But I will be collecting the debt, sometime."
"And don't forget to tell him that I'm not mad. But I will be collecting the debt, sometime."

languages.text: “还有，别忘了告诉他，我并没有生他的气。但总有一天，我会来收走他欠我的东西。”
languages.original_text: "And don't forget to tell him that I'm not mad. But I will be collecting the debt, sometime."

traits.locale_text: “还有，别忘了告诉他，我并没有生他的气。但总有一天，我会来收走他欠我的东西。”

languages.text: «Y no te olvides de decirle que no estoy enfadada, pero que algún día me pasaré a por lo que es mío».
languages.original_text: "And don't forget to tell him that I'm not mad. But I will be collecting the debt, sometime."

traits.locale_text: «Y no te olvides de decirle que no estoy enfadada, pero que algún día me pasaré a por lo que es mío».

languages.text: 「あと、あたしは怒ってないと忘れず伝えてよ。だけど借金はいつか取り立てるからね」
languages.original_text: "And don't forget to tell him that I'm not mad. But I will be collecting the debt, sometime."

traits.locale_text: 「あと、あたしは怒ってないと忘れず伝えてよ。だけど借金はいつか取り立てるからね」

languages.text: "Und sagt ihm auch, dass ich nicht wütend bin. Aber ich werde die Schuld einfordern, eines Tages."
languages.original_text: "And don't forget to tell him that I'm not mad. But I will be collecting the debt, sometime."

traits.locale_text: "Und sagt ihm auch, dass ich nicht wütend bin. Aber ich werde die Schuld einfordern, eines Tages."

languages.text: « Et ajoutez que je ne lui en veux pas. Mais il me remboursera sa dette, un jour ou l'autre. »
languages.original_text: "And don't forget to tell him that I'm not mad. But I will be collecting the debt, sometime."

traits.locale_text: « Et ajoutez que je ne lui en veux pas. Mais il me remboursera sa dette, un jour ou l'autre. »

languages.text: "Kızgın olmadığımı söylemeyi de unutma. Yalnız gün gelecek, borcumu tahsil edeceğim."
languages.original_text: "And don't forget to tell him that I'm not mad. But I will be collecting the debt, sometime."

traits.locale_text: "Kızgın olmadığımı söylemeyi de unutma ama gün gelir borcumu tahsil ederim."
